participant_1.name: Jake

participant_1.background: i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms. i've a pet cow.

participant_2.name: Linda

participant_2.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i move south during the winter. i have been retired for a years.

content.text: i am not sure what that is . i am a cow .
that's nice for you to say because i like to grill outdoors
i have never tried that . i am more of a homebody .
no , it is a weird fetish to have .
then why do you have it?
i just told you . i am not sure what to say .
no you didn't. I have been retired for a years so i can hear things
i have sworn to spear all the time i will try it
do you have a spare time right now becausei go gambling in my spare time
i do not do that . i am a very social person .
you think you have to but you probably lying
i am sure you are right . i am sure you are a great person !
i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days so get out of my lawn
i like that one . i like the smell of sage .
i move south during the winter and even more during you talking
